attributes.action: ensure a Minister from the cabinet is present when the bodies of UK Service Personnel are repatriated from war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is only right that the a member of the Cabinet is present at the UK arrival of someone who has given their life for their country. The rights or wrongs of the current policies are not important but the lack of real representation of our Government at the return of these personnel is shocking.
